ygData.subject: Re: [Re: [EQ_Tinkering] thermal cloak]
ygData.msgSnippet: Dang, made 400pp selling fireworks??  How much does he charge?  When I tried it I was lucky to make a few plat once in a blue moon. Tony Buser
ygData.messageBody:
Dang, made 400pp selling fireworks?? How much does he charge? When I
tried it I was lucky to make a few plat once in a blue moon.


Tony Buser | http://www.unconundrum.com
Ubershadow Leprechaun | http://www.juju.org
Level 44 Gnome Rogue | http://tunares.juju.org

[ I am but 'a sinn'r an' I 'ave no shame ]
[ T'filch all tha' glimm'rs, purloin all tha' shimm'rs ]
[ T'nab it an' grab it tha's mah fav'rite game ]


On 15 Dec 2000, Barry Clark wrote:

> you can tinker @ lvl 1!
> my brother is a lvl 4 gnome enchanter and makes fireworks all day long to sell
> in EC @ tunnell. he has like 400pp already!
> A gnome starts 50@ tinkering on birth.
> Barry
> Dominiono 13 necro-gnome /Quellious
